column2: # predicted_wOBAs <- left_join(inner_join(some_pitches,aggregate)%>% group_by(pitcher, pitch_type) %>% summarise(actual_wOBA = mean(wOBA), predicted_wOBA = mean(final_pred), pitch_count = n()),names, by = c("pitcher"="key_mlbam"))%>%mutate(differential = actual_wOBA-predicted_wOBA)%>%filter(pitch_count >= 100)
